hero.title: xMatix Warehouse
hero.description1: Pick accurately. Ship faster. Adapt continuously.
hero.description2: xMatix Warehouse helps organizations standardize and execute warehouse operations across inbound, storage, and outbound processes with real time visibility and governed workflows.

cardsData.title: The problem
cardsData.content: : Warehouse teams struggle with fragmented systems, manual task coordination, delayed updates, and limited visibility into daily operations.
list: Inbound and outbound processes are disconnected

cardsData.title: The xMatix Approach
cardsData.content: xMatix Warehouse standardizes how warehouse tasks are planned, executed, and monitored so every operation follows a consistent and auditable process.

keyCapabilities.title: Core Capabilities
keyCapabilities.description2: xMatix Warehouse modernizes warehouse execution without replacing existing WMS or ERP systems while improving throughput, accuracy, and control.

cardsData.title: Inbound and Outbound Workflow Execution
cardsData.description: Orchestrate receiving, putaway, picking, packing, and dispatch through standardized workflows.

cardsData.title: Task Based Warehouse Operations
cardsData.description: Guide warehouse staff with prioritized tasks and real time instructions.

cardsData.title: Inventory and Order Synchronization
cardsData.description: Keep warehouse actions aligned with sales orders and inventory availability.

cardsData.title: Exception Handling and Escalation
cardsData.description: Resolve shortages, damages, and delays within governed workflows.

cardsData.title: Adaptable Warehouse Processes
cardsData.description: Modify execution flows, rules, and validations without system rewrites.

requestADemo.heading: See xMatix Warehouse (WMS) in Action
requestADemo.description: Improve order accuracy, reduce delays, and gain real time visibility into warehouse execution without disrupting existing systems.
